configProperties.name: pageContainerTitleBarItemWidth
configProperties.description: An object containing visual configurations for the whole application. You can change the width of a single option with ``PageContainerTitleBar`` in the popup container by setting the current property.

configProperties.name: alertStyle
configProperties.description: The corner radius of the alert view.``AlertView``

configProperties.name: primaryHue
configProperties.description: You can change the hue of the base color, and then change the thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series. The UI components that use the relevant color series in the ease chat UIKit will also change accordingly. The default value is 203/360.0.

configProperties.name: secondaryHue
configProperties.description: You can change the primary hue. The default value is 203/360.0. After the primary hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the related color series in the ease chat UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: errorHue
configProperties.description: You can change the secondary hue. The default value is 155/360.0. After the secondary hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the related color series in the ease chat UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: neutralHue
configProperties.description: You can change the neutral hue. The default value is 203/360.0. After the neutral hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the related color series in the ease chat UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: neutralSpecialHue
configProperties.description: You can change the neutral special hue. The default value is 220/360.0. After the neutral special hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the relevant color series in the ease chat UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: avatarRadius
configProperties.description: The corner radius of the avatar image view of ``ChatInputBar``.

configProperties.name: actionSheetRowHeight
configProperties.description: ActionSheet row height.

configProperties.name: avatarPlaceHolder
configProperties.description: The placeholder image of the avatar image view of ``MessageCell``.

EaseChatroomUIKit.name: EaseChatroomUIKit
EaseChatroomUIKit.description: ios 平台的 EaseChatroomUIKit 组件

configProperties.name: pageContainerTitleBarItemWidth
configProperties.description: Created by 朱继超 on 2023/9/6. An object containing visual configurations for the whole application. You can change the width of a single option with ``PageContainerTitleBar`` in the popup container by setting the current property.

configProperties.name: alertCornerRadius
configProperties.description: The corner radius of the alert view.``AlertView``

configProperties.name: messageDisplayStyle
configProperties.description: You can change the overall cell layout style of the chat area by setting the current properties.``ChatMessageDisplayContentStyle``

configProperties.name: primaryHue
configProperties.description: You can change the hue of the base color, and then change the thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series. The UI components that use the relevant color series in the chat room UIKit will also change accordingly. The default value is 203/360.0.

configProperties.name: secondaryHue
configProperties.description: You can change the primary hue. The default value is 203/360.0. After the primary hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the related color series in the chat room UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: errorHue
configProperties.description: You can change the secondary hue. The default value is 155/360.0. After the secondary hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the related color series in the chat room UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: neutralHue
configProperties.description: You can change the neutral hue. The default value is 203/360.0. After the neutral hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the related color series in the chat room UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: neutralSpecialHue
configProperties.description: You can change the neutral special hue. The default value is 220/360.0. After the neutral special hue is changed, thirteen UIColor objects of the related color series will be changed. The color of UI components that use the relevant color series in the chat room UIKit will also change accordingly.

configProperties.name: messageTranslationLanguage
configProperties.description: The mirror type of the language code of LanguageType.``LanguageType``

configProperties.name: defaultMessageActions
configProperties.description: ActionSheet data source of the message being long pressed.``ActionSheetItemProtocol``

configProperties.name: defaultOperationUserActions
configProperties.description: ActionSheet data source of the member list cell on click ``...``.

configProperties.name: defaultOperationMuteUserActions
configProperties.description: ActionSheet data source of the mute member list cell on click ``...``.

configProperties.name: actionSheetRowHeight
configProperties.description: ActionSheet row height.

configProperties.name: giftPlaceHolder
configProperties.description: The placeholder image of the gift image view of the gift list cell ``GiftEntityCell``.

configProperties.name: giftPriceIcon
configProperties.description: The default image of the gift price of the gift list cell ``GiftEntityCell``.

configProperties.name: avatarPlaceHolder
configProperties.description: The placeholder image of the avatar image view of ``ChatMessageCell``.

configProperties.name: notifyMessageIcon
configProperties.description: The default icon of ``HorizontalTextCarousel``.

configProperties.name: notifyMessageOriginPoint
configProperties.description: The origin point of the global notification message. Deprecated 1.1.2

configProperties.name: identityPlaceHolder
configProperties.description: The placeholder image of the user-level image view of ``ChatMessageCell``.

configProperties.name: maxInputHeight
configProperties.description: The height limit of the input box in ``MessageInputBar``.

configProperties.name: inputBarCorner
configProperties.description: The corner radius of ``MessageInputBar``.

configProperties.name: avatarRadius
configProperties.description: The corner radius of the avatar image view of ``MessageInputBar``.

configProperties.name: giftAreaRowHeight
configProperties.description: The default height of ``GiftBarrageCell``.

configProperties.name: reportTags
configProperties.description: The label for message reporting types.

configProperties.name: reportReasons
configProperties.description: The label for message reporting types.

configProperties.name: participantsRowHeight
configProperties.description: The row height of the member cell.

configProperties.name: participantsPageSize
configProperties.description: The number of chat room members that you expect to get on each page.

configProperties.name: mutePageSize
configProperties.description: The number of  mute list page size.

configProperties.name: enablePinnedMessage
configProperties.description: Whether enable pin function of the message.
